title: War of 1812: United States at War - Napoleonic: Total War 3 Mod Gameplay
description:
In the most recent patch of NTW3 the mod developers added the United States of America.  Today we are going to be looking at the roster of the US and fight a small battle against the British.  Enjoy the Battle :D 

Napoleonic: Total War 3 is a mod for Napoleon Total War.

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
